div.p: ( a) Mean daily air temperature and ( b) precipitation at Burrishoole for a control period (1968–1997, grey line with filled diamond) and for a future climate period (2071–2100) for four GCM–RCM scenario combinations namely the E A2 (ECHAM 4 GCM and A2 SRES emission scenarios) and H B2 (HadA3 GCM and B2 SRES emission scenarios). Solid line, H A2; dashed line, H B2; solid line with square, E A2; dashed line with square, E B2.
